"If you think that your right to speech is more important than another human's worth and dignity, then you might want to rethink your stance." @xl772 on diversity statement editorial letters. #disruptJMM @JointMath #JMM2020 

So proud of my community!!!

I‚Äôm about to #DisruptJMM in a very small way at the beginning of my talk and I‚Äôm so nervous. I‚Äôm mildly nauseous and sweating...

We have to thank @pwr2dppl and others who put their selves and their bodies on the line to work to further justice in math. It‚Äôs incredibly difficult.
I ran at elevation to make it to @xl772's #DisruptJMM moment in her talk and it was well worth it but now I'm dead.
@mathprofcarrie @xl772 @pwr2dppl Room 113 right now! (Well in 5min)

Anyone at @JointMath working to #DisruptJMM: Become a FREE member of the Institute for the Quantitative Study of Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity. We use quant tools to discover the impact and scope of injustices and build solutions to remedy them. https://t.co/UYaOCQ6CCg

My Calling Bull (with R) talk will be TODAY (Thursday), 6:00 p.m.-6:50 p.m at the SIGMAA on Quantitative Literacy (SIGMAA QL) Meeting in Room 501 CCC. @JointMath #JointMath
https://t.co/ECkhd7j6Oi #DisruptJMM
